entry.sentence: The next morning she made herself available to the new mistress - not exactly with a light heart .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (JJ next) (NN morning)) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD made) (S (NP (PRP herself)) (ADJP (JJ available) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ new) (NN mistress)) (PRN (: -) (RB not) (PP (ADVP (RB exactly)) (IN with) (NP (DT a) (JJ light) (NN heart))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(morning-3, The-1) amod(morning-3, next-2) tmod(made-5, morning-3) nsubj(made-5, she-4) root(ROOT-0, made-5) nsubj(available-7, herself-6) xcomp(made-5, available-7) det(mistress-11, the-9) amod(mistress-11, new-10) prep_to(available-7, mistress-11) dep(with-15, not-13) advmod(with-15, exactly-14) dep(mistress-11, with-15) det(heart-18, a-16) amod(heart-18, light-17) pobj(with-15, heart-18)

entry.sentence: And the following day she left with the countess .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (CC And) (NP (DT the) (JJ following) (NN day)) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD left) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT the) (NNS countess)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: cc(left-6, And-1) det(day-4, the-2) amod(day-4, following-3) tmod(left-6, day-4) nsubj(left-6, she-5) root(ROOT-0, left-6) det(countess-9, the-8) prep_with(left-6, countess-9)
